    txt = f.readlines()

slides = ("\n".join(txt)).split("---\n")
page = 0
evaluator:
page += 1

if page < len(slides):
    title = f"SLIDE {page}/{len(slides)-1}"
    text = slides[page]
    grade = (0, "Suivant")
else:
    grade = (100,"Fin de la présentation")
